entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
